Class SocialForceAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.actions.AbstractAction<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>>

extends SAPEREMoveNodeAgent

    • Constructor Detail

      • SocialForceAgent

        public SocialForceAgent(IEnvironment<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> environment,
                        ILsaNode node,
                        RandomEngine random,
                        LsaMolecule molecule,
                        int pos,
                        int group,
                        boolean stopWhenAtTarget,
                        double vmaxval,
                        double mydimensionval,
                        double desiredspaceval,
                        double turnrightprobabilityval)
        Construct a pedestrian agent. with
        Parameters:
        environment - the current environment
        node - the current node
        random - the current random engine
        molecule - the LSA to inspect once moving (typically a gradient)
        pos - the position in the LSA of the value to read for identifying the new position
        group - the group identifier: if equals to 0 there is no group
        stopWhenAtTarget - flag used to let the user chose to make pedestrians to stop once the target is reached
        vmaxval - - maximum movement speed of the pedestrian
        mydimensionval - - pedestrian size
        desiredspaceval - - pedestrian desired space
        turnrightprobabilityval - - the probability of turn to the right

      • SocialForceAgent

        public SocialForceAgent(IEnvironment<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> environment,
                        ILsaNode node,
                        RandomEngine random,
                        LsaMolecule molecule,
                        int pos,
                        int group,
                        boolean stopWhenAtTarget,
                        double dt,
                        double vMax,
                        double momentum,
                        double oldw,
                        double neww,
                        double dimension,
                        double space,
                        double decRange,
                        double turnRange,
                        double desiredFactor,
                        double socialFactor,
                        double etaV,
                        double dodgeFactor,
                        double dodgeStrength,
                        double rightProbability,
                        double obstacleFactor,
                        double obstacleRange,
                        double obstacleStrength,
                        double detrimentalProbability,
                        double minpheromoneDist,
                        double decFactor,
                        double minDisp,
                        int minDispCyc)
        Construct a pedestrian agent. with
        Parameters:
        environment - the current environment
        node - the current node
        random - the current random engine
        molecule - the LSA to inspect once moving (typically a gradient)
        pos - the position in the LSA of the value to read for identifying the new position
        group - the group identifier: if equals to 0 there is no group
        stopWhenAtTarget - flag used to let the user chose to make pedestrians to stop once the target is reached
        dt - - step time interval
        vMax - - maximum movement speed of the pedestrian
        momentum - - momentum factor used to compute the new speed value
        oldw - - old direction weight used to compute the new direction as a weighted average
        neww - - new direction weight used to compute the new direction as a weighted average
        dimension - - pedestrian size
        space - - pedestrian desired space
        decRange - - range in which a pedestrian will decelerate because of the presence of other pedestrians
        turnRange - - range in which a pedestrian will turn because of the presence of other pedestrians
        desiredFactor - - desired force weight factor
        socialFactor - - social force weight factor
        etaV - - social force strength
        dodgeFactor - - dodge force weight factor
        dodgeStrength - - dodge force strength
        rightProbability - - the probability of turn to the right
        obstacleFactor - - obstacle force weight factor
        obstacleRange - - pedestrian interaction range with obstacles
        obstacleStrength - - obstacle force strength
        detrimentalProbability - - the probability of choosing a detrimental move
        minpheromoneDist - - minimum distance value used to check if a pedestrian has reached the target node
        decFactor - - proximity deceleration factor
        minDisp - - minimum displacement
        minDispCyc - - threshold used to stop a pedestrian if he can't move enough for a certain number of cycles

    • Method Detail

      • checkMaxpheromoneNodeDistance

        private void checkMaxpheromoneNodeDistance()
        Method used in group behavior to check the distance between the best node and the pedestrian node. If the pedestrian has reached the best node, in the next cycle will be performed a minimum gradient node search

      • computeDodgeForce

        private IPosition computeDodgeForce(INeighborhood<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> neigh,
                                    IPosition desiredForce,
                                    IPosition mypos)
        Method used to compute the interaction between pedestrian. In particular this method compute a force contribution representing the desire of the pedestrian to turn to the left or to the right when he's too near to another pedestrian.
        Parameters:
        neigh - - the current pedestrian neighborhood
        desiredForce - - the previously computed attractive force contribution through the target
        mypos - - the current pedestrian position
        Returns:
        dodgeForce: the desire of the pedestrian to dodge a neighbor

      • computeInteractions

        public IPosition computeInteractions(IPosition desiredForce,
                                     double myx,
                                     double myy)
        FIRST SOLUTION. Method used to compute the interaction (so the repulsive force contribution) between pedestrians
        Parameters:
        desiredForce - - the attractive force through the desired direction
        myx - - the x position coordinate of the pedestrian
        myy - - the y position coordinate of the pedestrian
        Returns:
        socialForce - the repulsive force contribution from interactions with other pedestrians

      • computeObstacleForce

        private IPosition computeObstacleForce(double myx,
                                       double myy,
                                       IPosition mypos)
        Method used to compute the repulsive force contribution from obstacles.
        Parameters:
        myx - - the current pedestrian x-coordinate position
        myy - - the current pedestrian y-coordinate position
        mypos - - the current pedestrian position
        Returns:
        obstacleForce - the repulsive force contribution from obstacles

      • execute

        public void execute()
        Description copied from interface: IAction
        Effectively executes this action.

      • getNearestEdge

        private Continuous2DEuclidean[] getNearestEdge(double myx,
                                               double myy,
                                               Rectangle2D bounds)
        Method used to retrieve the obstacle edge nearest to the pedestrian
        Parameters:
        myx - - the current pedestrian x-coordinate position
        myy - - the current pedestrian y-coordinate position
        bounds - - the rectangle obstacle bounds
        Returns:
        nearest - an array containing two Continuous2DEuclidean object representing nearest edge vertices

      • getSpeed

        public IPosition getSpeed()
        Get speed of this agent.
        Returns:
        - v: contains x and y speed components

      • isVisited

        private boolean isVisited(ILsaNode node)
        Check if the input node is contained in the visited node list
        Parameters:
        node - - the node to check
        Returns:
        true if the input node is in the list, false otherwise

      • maximumpheromoneSearch

        private void maximumpheromoneSearch(INeighborhood<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> neigh)
        Method used in group behavior to execute a maximum pheromone node search
        Parameters:
        mypos - - the current pedestrian position
        neigh - - the current pedestrian neighborhood

      • minimumGradientSearch

        private void minimumGradientSearch(INeighborhood<List<? extends ILsaMolecule>> neigh)
        Method used to execute a minumum gradient node search
        Parameters:
        mypos - - the current pedestrian position
        neigh - - the current pedestrian neighborhood

      • releasepheromone

        private void releasepheromone()
        Method used in group behavior to update the pheromone value on a node choose as target
        Parameters:
        pheromoneTmpl - - the pheromone molecule template
